name: BigQuery Data Lineage Policy tag propagation pipeline
description: Automatically adds Column-level ACLs on created tables using Data Lineage signals

parameters.name: lineagePubSubTopic
parameters.label: Composite Lineage topic
parameters.helpText: The name of Pubsub topic to listen for Data Lineage

parameters.name: monitoredPolicyTags
parameters.label: Propagated Policy Tags
parameters.helpText: The Data Catalog Policy Tags to apply on newly created tables based on lineage

parameters.name: monitoredCatalogTags
parameters.label: Monitored Catalog Tags
parameters.helpText: Data Catalog Tag-Template Ids to propagate to created tables based on lineage
